input_text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Cohere: Welcome to my birthday party, I am so happy you can come.
Adam: Thanks for inviting me. Here is the gift for you. Happy birthday, Francis! Many more happy and healthy years for you!
Cohere: Thank you, shall I open it now?
Adam: Yes, please do.
Cohere: Wow, a remote car model and my favorite brand. I really like it. That is so nice of you.
Adam: Yeah, I was really struggling whether I should give you this nice little car. It was the last one they had and I really like it so much myself.
Cohere: Typical you, always wanting to keep the best things for yourself. The more I appreciate the gift now.

Now write a summary of the conversation:
input_text.Response A: Adam comes to the birthday party of Francis and sends him a remote car model.
input_text.Response B: Adam gives Cohere a remote car model as her birthday present and she feels so grateful because Adam even wants to keep it for himself.

label_annotations.feedback:
A uses "sends" instead of "gives" - missing the actual precense of Adam. It also misses the point about Adam wanting it for himself and Francis appreciating the giving more because of that.
B assumes Cohere ( Francis) is female despite no evidence.
